thread.section_title: Frame My TV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frame My TV | framemytv.com
thread.title: Shari Cappelino
thread.title_full: Frame My TV reviewed by Shari Cappelino

author: Shari Cappelino
title: Shari Cappelino
text: The big question during our total kitchen remodel was "How can we incorporate a TV in the kitchen without seeing a TV?" After much research we commissioned Frame My TV to get the job done. We are thrilled with the results beyond measure. The artwork and frame are beautiful, and when we press the remote, our TV is revealed for our viewing pleasure. When finished, TV disappears, and we enjoy beautiful artwork. The entire order process was joyful due to the outstanding customer service and knowledge of the employees. This purchase was money well spent. We could not be more thrilled with this investment!
